column5: Anyone know if the Kawartha Floods are effecting the Port Perry/Seagrave region?? Was going to go up today and throw the line around a bit.
You can find out which areas are affected at the following link:  http://www.city.kawarthalakes.on.ca/residents/emergency-services/flood-information
Was in port today the lake is high but I haven't heard of any flooding around scugog
Drove thru seagrave today, looked fine. Normal spring level, but not flooding.  S.

Yeah I wound up going up there... looked alright, but no fish in the river where I was. Was hoping for a crappie or some sunfish... I did see one dead sunfish, but the water was crystal clear and it looked like not a single weed was growing in there yet.
